main event: On 7 October 1952, AF personnel observed a bright saucer-shaped object over the Yellow Sea that accelerated rapidly before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The visual sighting lasted between 3-5 minutes,The object was approximately 60 feet in diameter,It was illuminated so brightly that observers had to shield their eyes,No exhaust or propulsion system was observed,The object was confirmed by multiple AF personnel aboard a naval vessel.
witness description: AF personnel and naval officers on duty
